item.title: Testing in a Monorepo
item.description: Testing Web Components While any test framework can work, it’s better to test web components in a browser environment because that’s where they’ll be used. Node-based frameworks would require too much shimming of DOM calls that’d make the tests unrepresentative. and are good options for browser-based testing. is powered by ES-build, and so is the client-side of the app; let’s go down this path and see where it leads.
